people claim, and he will be said to them: Do you reach this?They say: No.And it is said to him: Did you reach your people?He says: Yes.And he is said to him: Who will testify to you?He says: Muhammad and his nation.So Muhammad and his nation are called, and he said to them: Did he reach this people?They say: Yes.It is said: What did you taught you?They say: Our Prophet, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, came to us, so he told us that the messengers have reached them, so that he said: “And you have made you a mother and a mother.” In Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, and
